body: It's been a long while since I've done one of these. Ask away kiddos!!!!!

title: Midnightstorm's 99999th AMA

replies.body: /kick or /ban
replies.body_tagged: /kick or /ban

replies.body:
I once had a turtle. His name was Todd. My dad found him on an airplane runway at 4am and brought him home. A month later, he died. The end.

Whenever something happens you never tell me right away, which kind of annoys me. Especially if you're mad at me and I want to fix what happened, but you won't tell me what happened. Anyways, we share so much in common and we've had some great laughs. We literally have too many inside jokes that I lost track of like all of them LOL.
P.S. I found a clue!

{tag=5a0b55defddb448caf5070856cbf39ee}

{tag=c2a4c847653e482ab62ed7f8b64330cb}
AILKANSFUJANJASKFNLK

{tag=e16d067223c74a02bd22965e38521c35}
We used to talk a lot in the Berzerk chat about a year ago but we haven't really caught up lately.
Deep Water ft. Kendrick Lamar & Justus by Dr. Dre
It's going okay. A lot of major events are gonna go down for me in the next few months :)
Honestly, Avicus seems to be getting weaker. I've noticed that I haven't been too concerned about it recently and that it would just be a thought in the back of my head. I took a LOA for a little bit and I realized the amount of drama I left behind. As soon as I came back, *poop* was being thrown back and forth.

{tag=02096be10c14490aac69b84de30cce84}
We used to be super close last year but a few things have happened since then. Idk.
Always.
You can leave now.
